translations.translation: And afterwards spread out the earth.
and thereafter spread out the earth,
After this, He spread out the earth,
And after it spread out the earth.
And after that He spread the earth,
And the earth, He expanded it after that.
and the earth-after that He spread it out,
And after that He spread the earth,
and the earth which He spread out,
And the earth!- thereafter He stretched it out.
Thereafter He spread out the earth,
And the earth, moreover, hath He extended (to a wide expanse);
And after that He spread the earth;
And the earth He extended after that;
And the earth after that He spread.
And after that He spread the earth.
[79:30] and after that He spread out the earth: He made it flat, for it had been created before the heaven, but without having been spread out;
(And after that He spread the earth) even then He spread it on the water; it is also said: 2,000 years after that He spread it on the water,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ دَحَاهَا } معناه بَسطَها
 وبعدَ: بمعنى معَ ذَلكَ دَحَاها
 وبعدَ ومعَ سَواءٌ في كَلامِ العَربِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما رتبها كذلك خلق { ٱلأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ } أي: بعد خلق السماوات وأعجب في خلقها بأن { دَحَاهَا } [النازعات: 30] مهدها وبسطها لمن يسكن عليها ويستقر فيها
